item.title: CVE-2023-37532|2024-09-17T13:44:52.795Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20commerce
item.description: HCL Commerce Remote Store server could allow a remote attacker, using a specially-crafted URL, to read arbitrary files on the system.
